languages.text: "Как-то в Каликсисе видел заспиртованную голову друкари. Долго не верил, что существует что-то настолько мерзкое, и был неправ — живьем вы еще хуже".
"I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
languages.original_text: "Как-то в Каликсисе видел заспиртованную голову друкари. Долго не верил, что существует что-то настолько мерзкое, и был неправ — живьем вы еще хуже".

traits.locale_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
"I saw a preserved Drukhari head once. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
"I saw a preserved Drukhari head once. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
"I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
"I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

languages.text: 「かつてキャリクシスで、保存されたデュカーリの首を見たことがある。長いあいだ、あれほどおぞましいものが実在することが信じられなかったが、俺は間違っていた。生きているお前のほうが、もっとひどい」
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: 「かつてキャリクシスで、保存されたデュカーリの首を見たことがある。長いあいだ、あれほどおぞましいものが実在することが信じられなかったが、俺は間違っていた。生きているお前のほうが、もっとひどい」

languages.text: "Ich habe einmal einen ausgestopften Drukhari gesehen, in Calixis. Ich glaubte lange, so etwas Widerwärtiges könne doch gar nicht existieren, aber ich lag falsch. Lebendig seid Ihr noch viel schlimmer."
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einmal einen ausgestopften Drukhari gesehen, in Calixis. Ich glaubte lange, so etwas Widerwärtiges könne doch gar nicht existieren, aber ich lag falsch. Lebendig seid Ihr noch viel schlimmer."

languages.text: « J'ai vu une tête de Drukhari préservée dans le secteur Calixis. Pendant longtemps, j'ai refusé de croire qu'une chose aussi répugnante pouvait réellement exister, mais je me rends compte maintenant que je me trompais. Vivants, vous êtes encore pires. »
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu une tête de Drukhari préservée dans le secteur Calixis. Pendant longtemps, j'ai refusé de croire qu'une chose aussi répugnante pouvait réellement exister, mais je me rends compte maintenant que je me trompais. Vivants, vous êtes encore pires. »

languages.text: «Una vez vi una cabeza de Drukhari embalsamada en Calixis. Durante mucho tiempo me costó creer que pudiese existir algo tan repulsivo, pero veo que me equivocaba: vivos sois aún peores».
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez vi una cabeza de Drukhari embalsamada en Calixis. Durante mucho tiempo me costó creer que pudiese existir algo tan repulsivo, pero veo que me equivocaba: vivos sois aún peores».

languages.text: “以前在卡利西斯的时候，我曾见过一颗保存完好的黑暗灵族头颅。在那之后很长时间，我都不敢相信，这么恶心的东西居然真的存在。现在看来，是我错了，活着的黑暗灵族更让人恶心。”
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: “以前在卡利西斯的时候，我曾见过一颗保存完好的黑暗灵族头颅。在那之后很长时间，我都不敢相信，这么恶心的东西居然真的存在。现在看来，是我错了，活着的黑暗灵族更让人恶心。”

languages.text: "Bir kere Calixis'te korunmuş bir Drukhari başı görmüştüm. Uzun süre o kadar iğrenç bir şeyin varlığına inanamamıştım ama yanılmışım. Senin dirinin yanında esamesi okunmaz."
languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kere Calixis'te korunmuş bir Drukhari başı görmüştüm. Uzun süre o kadar iğrenç bir şeyin varlığına inanamamıştım ama yanılmışım. Senin dirinin yanında esamesi okunmaz."

languages.original_text: "I saw a preserved Drukhari head once, back in Calixis. For a long time, I didn't believe something so disgusting could really exist, and I was wrong — you're even worse alive."
